text: 1. Just having a mini panic attack over here that the year is half over! 2. I think I’m making these s’mores cookies today! 3. What is this summerween thing! I’ve gotten so many Halloween emails it’s wild. 4. P.S. I still don’t understand how people are using these sunscreen face mists. Anything sprayed on my face goes into my eyes and the whole day is ruined. 5. This new name for diet coke kills me. Ha. 6. TV things!! So excited that The Bear is back! Also started watching We Were Liars. 7. The perfect beach sandwich does exist. 8. New to me podcast: Clues. Only a few episodes and they are high profile but I do like it. 9. Do something for yourself everyday!
html:
1. Just having a mini panic attack over here that the year is half over!

2. I think I’m making these s’mores cookies today!

3. What is this summerween thing! I’ve gotten so many Halloween emails it’s wild.

4. P.S. I still don’t understand how people are using these sunscreen face mists. Anything sprayed on my face goes into my eyes and the whole day is ruined.

5. This new name for diet coke kills me. Ha.

6. TV things!! So excited that The Bear is back! Also started watching We Were Liars.

7. The perfect beach sandwich does exist.

8. New to me podcast: Clues. Only a few episodes and they are high profile but I do like it.

9. Do something for yourself everyday!
